meanings.definition: To give life or energy to
meanings.sent1: Drinking water vitalizes our bodies and keeps us healthy.
meanings.sent2: Exercising regularly vitalizes our muscles and improves our strength.
meanings.sent3: The energetic music vitalizes the dance floor, making everyone move with joy.
meanings.sent4: Laughter vitalizes the atmosphere, filling it with positivity and happiness.
meanings.sent5: The sunrise vitalizes the sleepy town, painting the sky with vibrant colors.

meanings.definition: To make something more lively or active
meanings.sent1: Adding spices vitalizes the bland soup, making it more flavorful.
meanings.sent2: Music vitalizes the party, creating a fun and lively atmosphere.
meanings.sent3: The new paint color vitalizes the room, giving it a fresh and vibrant look.
meanings.sent4: Her enthusiasm vitalizes the team, motivating them to work harder.
meanings.sent5: The fresh breeze vitalizes the garden, bringing life to the flowers and plants.
